short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download NotionWord, a Chrome extension to learn new words every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use our NotionWord to connect to your Notion database and show them every time you open a new tab.

Notion is your all-in-one workspace, where you can write, plan, collaborate and get organized. Take notes, keep databases, build a wiki, project manage your team â€” all with one tool.

We launched NotionWord for language learners. If you have a Notion database contains a list of vocabularies, and you want a Flash Card Extension to display random word time you open a new tab, this extension is for you.

SETUP

1. Install extension
2. Open https://www.notion.so/my-integrations
3. Add new integration
4. Copy the Internal Integration Token
5. Open your database and invite your create Integration
6. Open new tab
7. Paste the Internal Integration Token in setting box
8. Choose database
9. Click save button
10. Enjoy!

Happy learning!
